    • Method Detail

      • confChanged

        private void confChanged(Configuration conf)
                  throws IOException
        This method gets called everytime before any read/write to make sure that any change to localDirs is reflected immediately.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createPath

              boolean checkWrite)
                 throws IOException
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getCurrentDirectoryIndex

        int getCurrentDirectoryIndex()
        Get the current directory index.
        Returns:
        the current directory index.

      • getLocalPathForWrite

        public Path getLocalPathForWrite(String pathStr,
                        long size,
                        Configuration conf,
                        boolean checkWrite)
                          throws IOException
        Get a path from the local FS. If size is known, we go round-robin over the set of disks (via the configured dirs) and return the first complete path which has enough space. If size is not known, use roulette selection -- pick directories with probability proportional to their available space.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • createTmpFileForWrite

        public File createTmpFileForWrite(String pathStr,
                         long size,
                         Configuration conf)
                           throws IOException
        Creates a file on the local FS. Pass size as LocalDirAllocator.SIZE_UNKNOWN if not known apriori. We round-robin over the set of disks (via the configured dirs) and return a file on the first path which has enough space. The file is guaranteed to go away when the JVM exits.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getLocalPathToRead

        public Path getLocalPathToRead(String pathStr,
                      Configuration conf)
                        throws IOException
        Get a path from the local FS for reading. We search through all the configured dirs for the file's existence and return the complete path to the file when we find one
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getAllLocalPathsToRead

        Iterable<Path> getAllLocalPathsToRead(String pathStr,
                                    Configuration conf)
                                throws IOException
        Get all of the paths that currently exist in the working directories.
        Parameters:
        pathStr - the path underneath the roots
        conf - the configuration to look up the roots in
        Returns:
        all of the paths that exist under any of the roots
        Throws:
        IOException

      • ifExists

        public boolean ifExists(String pathStr,
               Configuration conf)
        We search through all the configured dirs for the file's existence and return true when we find one
